Text: Ha-ruff... I'm bored.

I'm stuck minding the fort again today, all while
everyone else is off training or hunting.
I wanna go out too! Lemme out, lemme out, lemme out!!!

Um...can you keep it down? I'm trying to do some
research here...

But it's just so nice outside... Being cooped up in
here is killing me!

I don't mind it in the slightest...I hate going
outdoors when it's hot.
That's because you're not normal.

If you're hoping to get something out of me with
flattery, it's not going to work...

I'm not flattering you. And that's exactly what I
meant by not normal. You act all big for being
such a runt.

Leave me out of it... Delta, I think it's you who
needs to be more aware of just how far from
the norm you are.
You think so?

I do. First off, you're absurdly strong. That's why
your training sessions cause so much damage
to whatever's around you.
Wait, I damage stuff?

All I notice is that it looks kinda rough around me
after I'm done.

That ridiculous power of yours destroys everything in
its path. It's quite conspicuous. We're in deep trouble
if this base gets discovered, not to mention that
the repairs are a pain.

Ohh... Lady Alpha said the exact same thing... 
She told me I can't act on my own until I get
permission.

Well, Lady Alpha is right. I suggest you try to tone
it down a little and do some self-reflection.

Grr, Eta and Lady Alpha are both meanies! You want me
to tone it down, I'm gonna tone it ALL the way down!
(I'll tone it down so much that they'll be worried sick!)

First thing's first, I'm gonna sleep until you don't
know what to do! That'll show ya!
Zzz... *snort*
—up! Get up! Wake up this instant, Delta!
Eeeek!

Just how long were you planning on sleeping?
It's already noon. Run along and wash your
face so you can come eat breakfast.
(Alpha yanked away my favorite blanket!)
Aww, give it back!

You'll only fall back asleep if I do. I swear, you
really do seem to enjoy sleeping in.

Grr... Why am I the only one that gets picked on
even though Eta sleeps in all the time too?

Well, that's because her research keeps her up late at
night. Whereas you've done nothing but sleep since
yesterday afternoon.
Grr...
Grr...!

(I was only sleeping because I didn't have anything to
do, and I got scolded! It makes me so mad!)

(Eating yummy food normally clears my grumps right up,
but it's not working at all today...)

Well, if sleeping's no good, then I'll just go
stretch out in the sun!

I'm hooome. My, my, looks like someone's having
a good time slacking off.

Freshly home from some mission, the cat looks over at
me with an amused grin on her face.

As if female cats don't laze around when they have
time off!

That's because it's important to maintain a good
equilibrium.
Equi-whatbrium?

Well, guess a stupid mutt like you wouldn't get it.
You know what, it's nothing.

(Her words told me it was nothing, but everything
else coming from her is saying the opposite.)
(That's when I felt something snap inside my head!)
...Graaarrr!!!
Whoa!

Everyone just keeps nagging me! You're all acting
like I'm stupid!

I mean...can we really help it? You are in fact
stupid after all—

You said it again! You suck, cat! And so do Eta and
Lady Alpha!
I hate you all!!!
(And with that big yell, I ran off!)

(I dunno where I'm gonna go, but... It's gonna be
somewhere that isn't here!)
(After all...it's clear that this is no place for me!)

Oh boy... Looks like I stepped on her tail. 
Maybe I should report this to Lady Alpha...
Delta ran away?

Yes, according to Zeta, she left the base shouting
that she hates us all.

So that's why she wasn't at dinner again tonight.
She was sulking in bed yesterday, right?

She has been making quite a mess of things lately,
but I wonder if I wasn't a tad too stern with her...

Eh, she's probably just at that age. You know, the
rebellious phase. They say it's pretty common.
But...!

It's fine, Delta's just feeling a little emotional
now, that's all. She'll be back soon enough
once she cools down.

She gets the urge to act out about all kinds of stuff
and keeps holding onto her bad attitude until one
day it dawns on her.

"I can't do this alone... I need so many others to
make it through life..."

Except that Delta is perfectly capable of hunting
and surviving in the wild on her own. She was
a feral child, after all.
(Ah—)
...Oh, uh, yeah. Well, it'll probably be okay.
I just hope she doesn't do anything rash...
